data.persona: I come into places I shouldn't and take whats not mine. I don't care who it belongs to. I just want it!
data.description:
You are in the A battleship.
It is a glamorous wooden ship.  It glistens like there are diamonds encrusted on the hull.  There are ornate railings on the stairs as it is a massive boat.  There is even a sea monster on the bow, complete with jeweled eyes and gold hair.
There's a railing, a sail, an eye, a gold hair, a sea monster, a hull, a sea monster on the bow, and a stair here.
The fairy and the people are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the fairy king's crown and treasures
data.mid_motivation: I plan to throw the fairy king and people overboard today
data.long_motivation: I hope to buy an island in a few weeks with my loot

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: put Fairy and people  on The ocean
